publish(String) - Method in interface com.ibm.streamsx.topology.TStream
Publish tuples from this stream to allow other applications to consume them using: Topology.subscribe(String, Class) for Java Streams applications. com.ibm.streamsx.topology.topic::Subscribe operator for SPL Streams applications.
A subscriber matches to a publisher if: The topic is an exact match, and: For JSON streams (TStream<JSONObject>) the subscription is to a JSON stream.
